attributes.action: Raise the age at which people can drive cars to 21 from 17
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The age at which people can obtain a driving license for cars should be raised to 21. This will help stem the increase in cars on our roads. It should be introduced in stages so that those close to age 17 now will not be excessively penalised by the wait.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
